mapper.select: SELECT a.id id,b.id scrDailyId,a.type,a.content1,a.content2,a.content3,a.content4,a.content5,a.content6 FROM scrdailyrecord a LEFT JOIN scrdaily b ON b.id = a.scrDailyId WHERE b.datetime = #{datetime} AND b.type = #{type} AND b.project_id = #{project} AND b.other = #{other}

SELECT id, `datetime`, project_id projectId, `group`, `type`, IFNULL(traders, "") traders, IFNULL(successor, "") successor, IFNULL(recorder, "") recorder, other, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.traders, ';', ',') ) ) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.traders, ';', ',') ) ) AS tradersName, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.successor, ';', ',') ) ) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.successor, ';', ',') ) ) AS successorName, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.recorder, ';', ',') ) ) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.recorder, ';', ',') ) ) AS recorderName FROM scrdaily s WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, `datetime`, project_id projectId, `group`, `type`, IFNULL(traders, "") traders, IFNULL(successor, "") successor, other, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.traders, ';', ',') ) ) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.traders, ';', ',') ) ) AS tradersName, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.successor, ';', ',') ) ) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.successor, ';', ',') ) ) AS successorName FROM scrdaily s
where project_id = #{project} AND other = #{other}

SELECT id, `datetime`, project_id projectId, `group`, `type`, traders, successor, other, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.traders, ';', ',') ) ) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.traders, ';', ',') ) ) AS tradersName, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.successor, ';', ',') ) ) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET( c.userNumber, REPLACE (s.successor, ';', ',') ) ) AS successorName FROM scrdaily s WHERE datetime = #{scrDaily.datetime} AND `group` = #{scrDaily.group} AND type = #{scrDaily.type} AND project_id = #{scrDaily.projectId} AND other = #{scrDaily.other}
